          <title>
            <string language="en">Glowing splint in oxygen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Glühende Schiene im Sauerstoff</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Attelle rougeoyante en oxygène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Splint incandescendo no oxigênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Splint emettente luce in ossigeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καμμένος νάρθηκας στο οξυγόνο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tablilla que brilla intensamente en oxígeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the glowing splint bursting into flames when exposed to oxygen.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">flame</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">Gas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">glowing splint</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Testing</string>
          </keyword>

          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die glühende Schiene, die 
in Flammen birst, wenn sie Sauerstoff herausgestellt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'attelle rougeoyante 
éclatant dans des flammes une fois exposée à l'oxygène.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o splint incandescendo 
que estoura em flamas quando exposta ao oxigênio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra lo splint emettente 
luce che scoppia nelle fiamme una volta esposta ad ossigeno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει καμμένος νάρθηκα που 
εκρήγνυται στις φλόγες όταν εκτίθενται στο οξυγόνο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la tablilla que brilla 
intensamente que reparte en las llamas cuando está expuesta al 
oxígeno.</string>
          </description>
